responsibilities: Design, develop, and test large complex systems.
Ensure productivity of the organization’s employees by designing, developing, and testing systems that support organizational goals.
Support the Lead Software Engineer in creating standards for the organization.
Ensure the quality of solutions delivered to production through code reviews.
Provide mentoring to members of the software development team.
Provide code reviews and feedback to team members to ensure solutions are built to standards and allow maximum flexibility for future business needs.
Lead complex projects with little to no oversight.
Use knowledge of the business to guide product direction and development.
Accurately communicate pertinent information.
Solve problems and make decisions on a daily basis relative to software development responsibilities.
Design, develop, test, and document software systems to meet business needs in compliance with the Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC).
Exemplify the desired culture and philosophies of the organization.
Work effectively as a team member with other members of management.
Participate in Agile development ceremonies.
Continuously evaluate current systems and processes and suggest improvements.
Integrate Generative AI into new and existing business processes to solve business problems and generate new business opportunities.
Assist in the creation, refinement, and socialization of reference architectures.
Design and implement new Generative AI architectures within larger systems.
Stay up to date with Generative AI tools and techniques.
Design, develop, and implement ML/AIOps with a focus on automation.
Design and execute A/B tests to enable data-driven decision making.
Curate training data for model fine-tuning.
Fine-tune models as needed.
Promote GenAI concepts and techniques across technology and the organization.
Develop, maintain, and optimize data pipelines to process and manage data for AI/ML applications, including knowledge base creation and maintenance.
qualifications: Strong understanding of Object Oriented and System Design principles and best practices.
Knowledge of Generative AI tools and techniques.
Ability to design, develop, and implement ML/AIOps with a focus on automation.
Ability to design and execute A/B tests for data-driven decision making.
Ability to curate and fine-tune training data for models.
Ability to promote GenAI concepts and techniques across the organization.
Ability to develop, maintain, and optimize data pipelines for AI/ML applications.
Ability to develop and empower people.
analysis: The job responsibilities and skills clearly indicate involvement with Generative AI (GenAI) and potentially language models (LLMs). The responsibilities include integrating Generative AI into business processes, designing and implementing new Generative AI architectures, staying updated with Generative AI tools and techniques, and promoting GenAI concepts across the organization. Additionally, the skills required include knowledge of Generative AI tools and techniques, the ability to curate and fine-tune training data for models, and the ability to promote GenAI concepts. These responsibilities and skills strongly suggest that the job involves working with Generative AI and possibly language models, as these are key components of GenAI applications.
